About Me

Welcome to my website! I am a Ph.D. candidate at the University of Maryland, College Park, advised by Yanir A. Rubinstein. I just finished my fifth year, and plan to graduate Spring 2025. I am interested in convex geometry and geometric analysis.

Code

magicMahler is a Python library designed for geometric computations involving polytopes in the plane. Key features include calculating essential notions from my reserach:

  • Lp-Mahler volumes
  • The isotropic constant
  • The B-constant
  • Implementation of the Mahler algorithm
  • Implementation of th Graham scan for finding the extreme points in $nlogn$ time.

The library is currently under construction but here is an example of a Graham scan implementation:
